allIssues.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
allIssues.help: Images must have alternate text
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
allIssues.testPageTitle: DHL Privatkunden - Paketversand und Paketempfang mit DHL

allIssues.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
allIssues.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  List item does not have a <ul>, <ol> parent element without a role, or a role="list"
allIssues.source: • Privatkunden
allIssues.testPageTitle: DHL Privatkunden - Paketversand und Paketempfang mit DHL

allIssues.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
allIssues.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  maximum-scale on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices
allIssues.testPageTitle: DHL Privatkunden - Paketversand und Paketempfang mit DHL

allIssues.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
allIssues.help: Interactive controls must not be nested
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  Using a negative tabindex on an element inside an interactive control does not prevent assistive technologies from focusing the element (even with aria-hidden="true")
allIssues.testPageTitle: DHL Privatkunden - Paketversand und Paketempfang mit DHL
